Article.Title: Firefly Reruns Returning To Basic Cable
Article.Content: By a show of hands, who here believes Firefly is the best show ever created? Everyone? Good. We can move on then. The Science Channel just picked up the rights to the series and will air the complete thing along with some new extras. The plan is to included with every episode segments with physicist Dr. Michio Kaku who will talk about the physics behind the show. Of course these are just the original 14 episodes, but The Science Channel could make a bundle just running them back to back from now until the end of time. The adventures of Mal, Zoe and Jayne never get old.
